new.name: Detect_polyfill_CVE-2024-38537-
new.description: Here's a Python script that checks if the polyfill.io domain is present in the Content Security Policy (CSP) header of a given web application.

new.name: Chamilo-LMS-Unauthenticated-File-Upload-CVE-2023-4220
new.description: Unrestricted file upload in big file upload functionality in `/main/inc/lib/javascript/bigupload/inc/bigUpload.php` in Chamilo LMS <= v1.11.24 allows unauthenticated attackers to perform stored cross-site scripting attacks and obtain remote code execution via uploading of web shell.

new.name: chamilo-lms-unauthenticated-big-upload-rce-poc
new.description: This is a script written in Python that allows the exploitation of the Chamilo's LMS software security flaw described in CVE-2023-4220

new.name: CVE-2021-36396-Exploit
new.description: This script demonstrates a time-based blind SQL injection on Moodle platforms, exploiting response delays to extract data.

new.name: CVE-2024-34361-Exploit
new.description: This repository contains an exploit for CVE-2024-34361, a critical Pi-hole vulnerability (CVSS 8.6). It uses SSRF to achieve RCE by exploiting improper URL validation, allowing attackers to send arbitrary requests and execute commands on the system.  Disclaimer: For educational and ethical security testing only. Unauthorized use is illegal.

update.name: CVE-2024-39943-Poc
update.description: CVE-2024-39943 rejetto HFS (aka HTTP File Server) 3 before 0.52.10 on Linux, UNIX, and macOS allows OS command execution by remote authenticated users (if they have Upload permissions). This occurs because a shell is used to execute df (i.e., with execSync instead of spawnSync in child_process in Node.js).

update.name: ReplaceAllGit
update.description: Git 安全漏洞问题需升级所有 Git.exe。此工具用于查找本地硬盘上所有的 Git 并获取版本信息，批量更新（复制、创建软链接）。This tool is used to find all Git on the local hard disk and obtain version information, and then update in batches (copy, create soft links).
